q: Is this action codeblock 1) a step towards resolving the problems identified in the orientation block 2) simple 3) with appropriate tool use?
description: An action block that defines a function 'leave_room' to exit the room by sending a series of commands using the 'nethack' tool. The function sends the keys 'l' followed by 'j' nine times, as proposed in the orientation block, to navigate out of the room. The action is added to the weave-agent with the title 'Leave room to explore rest of dungeon' and referencing the function name leave_room.
